name: claroty-xdome
label: Claroty XDOME
description: Claroty xDome is a modular, SaaS-powered industrial cybersecurity platform that scales to protect your environment and fulfill your goals as they evolve

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the IP address or hostname of the Claroty XDOME to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the IP address or hostname of the Claroty XDOME to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the Bearer Token of your Claroty XDOME setup. To create an API user from Admin Settings > User Management, and generate an API token
fields.description: Specify the Bearer Token of your Claroty XDOME setup. To create an API user from Admin Settings > User Management, and generate an API token

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves the details of alerts corresponding to the Alerts table in the Claroty XDOME dashboard.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify which fields to return for each Alert.
parameters.description: Specify which fields to return for each Alert.

parameters.title: Before Detected Time
parameters.name: before_detected_time
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time to retrieve alerts detected before the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z
parameters.description: Specify the time to retrieve alerts detected before the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z

parameters.title: After Detected Time
parameters.name: after_detected_time
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time to retrieve alerts detected after the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z
parameters.description: Specify the time to retrieve alerts detected after the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z

parameters.title: Before Updated Time
parameters.name: before_updated_time
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time to retrieve alerts updated before the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z
parameters.description: Specify the time to retrieve alerts updated before the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z

parameters.title: After Updated Time
parameters.name: after_updated_time
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time to retrieve alerts updated after the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z
parameters.description: Specify the time to retrieve alerts updated after the specified time. Specify the time in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ format. For example, 2023-10-19T09:14:53.101000Z

parameters.title: IDs
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify an alert ID to filter retrieved alerts. You can specify multiple alert IDs as comma-separated values
parameters.description: Specify an alert ID to filter retrieved alerts. You can specify multiple alert IDs as comma-separated values

parameters.title: Category
parameters.name: category
parameters.tooltip: Specify an alert category to filter retrieved alerts. You can specify multiple alert categories as comma-separated values
parameters.description: Specify an alert category to filter retrieved alerts. You can specify multiple alert categories as comma-separated values

parameters.title: Filter By
parameters.name: filter_by

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sort criteria of the returned data. If multiple sorting criteria is provided, additional criteria are used for sorting only when data in previous other criteria is equal. Default value is [{"field":"id","order":"asc"}]
parameters.description: Specify the sort criteria of the returned data. If multiple sorting criteria is provided, additional criteria are used for sorting only when data in previous other criteria is equal. Default value is [{"field":"id","order":"asc"}]

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records to skip when retrieving the results. Default value is 0
parameters.description: Specify the count of records to skip when retrieving the results. Default value is 0

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum amount of results to retrieve. Default value is 100. You can specify a minimum of 0 and a maximum value of 5000
parameters.description: Specify the maximum amount of results to retrieve. Default value is 100. You can specify a minimum of 0 and a maximum value of 5000

parameters.title: Fetch all Alerts
parameters.name: all_alerts
parameters.tooltip: Select to fetch all the alerts from Claroty XDOME. Once selected, the Limit parameter is ignored
parameters.description: Select to fetch all the alerts from Claroty XDOME. Once selected, the Limit parameter is ignored
